import React, { Component } from "react"; class NewFoodtruck extends Component { state = { name: "", location: "", category: "", hours: "", score: 0, description: "", }; handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e); }; render() { return (
Add a new FoodTruck to your profile!
); } } export default NewFoodtruck;
